The tsunami from the 7.4 was well under one meter in height. The earthquake is strike-slip which reduces - but does not eliminate - the tsunami hazard. There may be consequences such as landslides too which may create a larger tsunami than you would expect from the earthquake alone.
JUST IN: 7.8 magnitude earthquake hits Drake Passage, near South America. - PTWC/NERV - https://x.com/AZ_Intel_/status/1976750290817765732
